title: Thank You For Your Support on #GG19! ğŸ’š
html:
Gitcoin Grants 19 came to a close on November 29th, marking an incredible milestone in community support. With a total of $600k+ in donations spread across 316k+ contributions throughout the project rounds, once again, the vibrant ecosystem showcased the remarkable power of unity and collaboration. ğŸ‘ ğŸ‰

Celebrating the results ğŸ‰

A heartfelt THANK YOU goes out to the 100+ donors who supported ReFi DAO's New Chapter. Each contribution plays a pivotal role in shaping the new mission and vision of ReFi DAO.

Your support is the backbone of this transformative journey. ğŸ’š

This round also witnessed the involvement of 11 ReFi Local Nodes and aligned projects like ReFi EBF and the ReFi Knowledge Graph in the Gitcoin Project rounds.

We are incredibly proud of your success, and we can't wait to see what will result in the upcoming building season. ğŸ’ª

What is coming nextâ“ğŸ‘‡

ReFi DAO Forum ğŸ—£ï¸

We'd love to see you at the upcoming ReFi DAO Forum, happening on December 12th at 4 PM UTC. This is an open space where we explore the current state of ReFi DAO, what needs to be done, and whatâ€™s coming next.

It is a great opportunity to share a space with the wider network, contribute thoughts and ideas to shape the next steps, and invite interested parties to join ReFi DAO 2.0 organising team if they feel called.

Reserve Your Spot!

Local Node Beta Cohort ğŸ¤

In January 2024 we are planning to launch the 8-week Local Node Beta Cohort with a series of sessions with industry experts to provide comprehensive insights and guidance to both new and established Local Nodes.

The Cohort aims to empower Local Nodes by providing tools and expertise, spanning from crafting impactful business models to mastering communication, marketing strategies, and fundraising techniques. The cohort is geared toward guiding a successful path for local and global regeneration.

Applications for the Local Node Beta Cohort are still open! If you are a founder interested in setting up a Local Node in your city, check out the Local Node Toolkit and apply through the Tally form below! ğŸ‘‡

Apply to the Local Node Beta Cohort!

Thank you! ğŸ™

We are incredibly grateful for the support, dedication, and unity displayed by our community. Each donation, every nod of encouragement, and the collaborative spirit have paved the way for a better future for all.

The impact of the ecosystem extends far beyond "vonations"; it's a testament to the strength of collaboration and the belief in the power of community-driven initiatives.

As ReFi DAO embarks on this new chapter, fueled by your support, we invite you to join us on this transformative journey. Together, we'll continue to innovate and build the ReFi movement towards a regenerative future.
